item.title: Resume (English)
item.description:
TECHNICAL DIRECTOR, SOFTWARE ENGINEERING

I am a Senior Software Engineer working at a major game company in Shanghai (China). In the past I have worked at various other big companies in the Netherlands including Guerrilla Games (Amsterdam) and ICT (Rotterdam). I am passionate about Technology. Apart from C++/C# I have special interest in high performance and embedded systems.

PERSONAL INFO

Gender: Male
Date of Birth: June 19, 1971
Nationality: Dutch
Residence: Shanghai, China (China Permanent Residence Card holder)
Address: 3-1506, 34 South Yili Road, Shanghai, China
Mobile: 186xxxxxxxx
Website: website
Email: jurgen dot kluft at gmail dot com
